author: Aidan
text: 'Absolutely no complaints. Friendly and helpful service. Great selection and will help you find anything you need. My go to store'

author: Jaclyn Verga
text: 'Staff are always helpful and friendly. If something is sold out
column5: they will take down your name and text you when it comes back in stock. Awesome service.'

author: Jayme Lisiewski
text: 'Great selection of craft beer and a nice
column5: wide variety is whisky. Very friendly staff always willing to help in any way they can'

author: Andrew Chernicoff
text: 'Always my go to Liquor store in Hoboken. Staff are always helpful and friendly and go above and beyond to make sure we find what we want
column5: and if not
column6: will make a special order for you. I walked in on Saturday
column7: asked for a beer they did not carry
column8: and I got a call on Monday that it was in. Awesome service.'

author: Mario Salto
text: 'I LOVE the amount of different choices they have. My friends and I had a party and this store gave us such a variety of choices than we usually have. DEFINETLY RECOMMEND.'

author: Catherine Z
text: "I live close to several liquor stores
column5: but I will go the extra 1/2 mile to get to Delite Liquor because of their service and selection.\n\nI've gone to places like Sparrow and have asked them to call me when certain wines/drinks come in and they never follow up. Sparrow will also say something is out of stock without helping me look
column6: only for me to find it a few minutes later.\n\nThe service is also 10x better than other stores in Hoboken. They are kind
column7: give you the time of day
column8: and are incredibly helpful. Delight will not only call/text me when my selection has come back in stock
column9: but they will also hold special drinks if you ask them too.\n\nBest liquor store in Hoboken by far."

author: Abhishek Shukla
text: 'Friendly staff
column5: good selection and convenient location. What more could you ask of a liquor store?'

author: Sarvesh Mohite
text: 'I was totally amazed by craft beer selection!! Especially from Maine & Vermont!! Lots of local breweries as well! Fair prices store was neat and clean HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!! ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è'

author: Alicia Lester
text: 'Best liquor store in the neighborhood. The owner really knows his stuff and gives very useful suggestions.'

author: Theo S
text: 'Amazing Service
column5: Friendly Staff and amazing prices definitely would recommend this place for the best drinks in hoboken !!! üòä'

author: Jade Briggs
text: 'i love this place. i order delivery from them thru drizly and it comes in under 30 minutes every time. i had an issue once using and i was able to call and speak to someone and they fixed everything and had my order delivered in ten minutes. these people are so kind and fast. dont watse money anywhere else on a friday night or even a wed...lol'

author: Chris Brauner
text: 'Excellent service and a very helpful
column5: friendly staff. Decent prices... Couldn‚Äôt say better things about this place!'

author: Courtney Mulligan
text: 'Love Delite! Harry is the best and literally like a fine and spirits concierge. I love going there as well as super fast + convenient delivery. He makes everything so easy! So happy to always shop local and small. It\'s so nice when an Owner extends that personal touch and goes the extra mile for his customers. With Harry
column5: I would even call customers
column6: "clients." I have a favorite variety of wine and he is always willing give me the heads up when it\'s in stock. Check out Delite. You won\'t be disappointed.'

author: Brian Firestone
text:
'Pop Quiz: name a store in the business of selling things - that doesn‚Äôt show prices on 50% of the items it sells ?
Ding ding ding !! Delite Liquor Store !

Any reason for this: that prices aren‚Äôt shown for much of the beer that you peddle ? Please explain this business decision to your customers.'

author: Kevin O'Keefe
text: 'One of my very favorite stores in Hoboken with friendly and helpful staff and very reasonable prices.'

author: Ray Tin
text: 'This is a great liquor store... Harry and team are always great... speedy delivery and great service. Thanks so much'

author: Binoy Vasavada
text: 'Nice
column5: clean store with good liquor prices.'

author: Ishaan Wanikar
text: 'Really good Selection of Cali Cab and Pinot Noir handful of beers from Vermont! Place was nice and clean with very friendly customer service!! Great recommendations!'

author: Brian Pierson
text: 'Why does your store refuse to show the prices for all of the items you peddle . . like any normal business ? Is it so that you can easily manipulate and overcharge customers ?\n\nAn honest response is eagerly awaited - though not expected . . as this has been inquired about for awhile without any fix.'

author: Kishore Reddy
text: 'Wonderful wines
column5: reasonably priced
column6: and their customer service exceeded anything expected. Clean & neat setup!! All COVID-19 protocols are stickily followed. Certainly happy to have found this resource!!'

author: Connor Purcell
text: 'The only liquor store I‚Äôll order from in Hoboken anymore. It always arrives quickly and if they ever don‚Äôt have what I order
column5: they reach out to line up a substitute. Five stars.'

author: Anthony Orlando
text: 'Best Liquor store in Hoboken. Harry
column5: the owner is so personable and really knows his wines and liquors. If he doesn‚Äôt have something he‚Äôll get it for you immediately. The customer service is second to none.'

author: neel parikh
text: 'I have been coming here for some time now and let me tell you
column5: this place is the best wine/liquor spot in Hoboken! Great selection of all your liquor needs. The staff is super friendly and always happy to help. The prices are the best in town. This will always be my go to place.'

author: Abdel Bhikam
text: 'One of the most attractive store I‚Äôve ever been too
column5: in town!  Very appearing & organized with music. Unlike other wine/liquor stores just slacks Gets you in the mood to party & drink up! With cheerful staff!'

author: Derrick Davis
text: 'I have been coming to this store for about 4 years. When it changed hands I thought we were going to have to find a new store. However after many changes and upgrades I have to say this is still my go to spot. Prices are always competitive and Harry is always friendly and willing to answer any questions. You guys are killing it and keep it up!'

author: Carolyn Bazan
text: 'Great store! The staff is super friendly and goes above and beyond with their customer service!'

author: James M
text: 'Delite is great and their selection is excellent.  The staff and owner are always friendly and extremely helpful.  Delivery is always quick and easy too.  Highly recommend!'

author: Irania Marin
text: 'My favorite liquor store in Hoboken
column5: the customer service is great and the staff is super friendly. The selection is the best in the area as well in my opinion
column6: during the holiday season they always stock a variety of new seasonal craft beers which is great especially if you are in the mood to try something new. I always stop here to buy liquor to pre-game prior to hitting the local bars since its right on Washington St. They also deliver which is super convenient if you dont feel like walking over!'

author: marilyn nizama
text: 'I placed an order via Drizly on cold night received my order very fast! Good reliable & fast service at Delite!üëç'

author: Nancy Hernandez
text: 'One the friendliest and helpful people I ever met at Delite Market who clearly takes pride in his work. Buying good value price wine is typically an experience for my boyfriend and I. Delite‚Äôs staff makes delightful always offering tastings and suggestions for new wine lovers! Also got my delivery order very fast on a rainy day!'

author: Renee Grimm
text: 'This store and their people are great. I‚Äôve been looking for a specific type/flavor of bourbon for my Mom when she visits. They offered to order the bourbon and it‚Äôll arrive within a day or two. Such great service!!!'

author: Ana Abedini
text: 'Ordered from minibar from this place
column5: called him after 1 hour to follow up on my order
column6: he said he will not deliver to Jersey city because it‚Äôs out of his territory! I called minibar they said he just decided not to deliver. You are\ndefinitely in his territory!!!! Terrible customer service!'

author: Todd Rosman
text: "Inquired about a bottle of whiskey for someone's birthday that they didn't have in stock. They got it delivered the next day and the service was incredible. Very responsive and helpful!!"

author: Jane Migliore
text: "I love this place! They have a huge selection of beers. And they will order rare beers if they don't have it in stock. Plus
column5: the owners are so friendly and nice!"

author: Richa Jadhav
text: 'Great Customer Service. They make you feel as family. Always has great suggestions in wine and very clean compared to other stores in the area. I would definitely recommend to friends and family.'

author: Dezarae Caicedo
text: 'GREAT SELECTION
column5: AND AFTER LOOKING AROUND OTHER LIQUOR STORES
column6: I WAS HAPPY TO HAVE FOUND THE TWO BOTTLES I HAD PURCHASED THAT WERE 3-5$ CHEAPER AT DELITE MARKET THAN THE OTHER STORES! WHICH IS ALSO SAVING THAT CAN ADD UP QUICKLY IF YOU ARE STACKING UP FOR THE HOLIDAY SEASON FOR EXAMPLE'

author: AIberto DIAZ
text:
'(Translated by Google) Eleven # 1 Prosecco

(Original)
Ecelente #1 Prosecco'

author: Nitin Hazarani
text: 'Great Selection on wine and draft beer and after looking around the liquor store
column5: I was happy to realized the two bottles I bought were $3-5 cheaper then any other liquor store in Hoboken. Everything was very organized and they have one of the best collection in New York Metropolitan Area.'

author: Steve Stojanovich
text: 'Just ordered from them using Drizly. I‚Äôve used Drizly several times for delivery but this is my first with Delite. They were out of one of the things I ordered (it happens
column5: no big deal!) and the communication was PERFECT. They found a replacement and let me know immediately. Fantastic service!!'

author: sweta chovatiya
text: 'My favourite thing about Delite Market & wine is their contributions back to Mound; they truly care about their local community and are such nice individuals! - Sweta'

author: Ronald Neree
text: 'Love this place great service awesome selection!!!!'

author: Nick Knight
text: 'One of my favorite neighborhood bottle shops. Great selection of wines and craft beer. Clean and organized. New manager
column5: Harry
column6: is very helpful and will order special items.'

author: Pankaj Savaliya
text: 'Very good selection of Craft Beer. Staff is cheerful all the time.'

author: Blake E
text: 'Great place to shop at if your looking to have a great night. Went in last week for some wine and had a lot to choose from
column5: thankfully the nice attendant helped me find what I was looking for. Not a lot of places know what they are selling but they do and have the best wines. Went back in later that night to get more beer and they have great prices for that as well. Best place for drinks. Coming back next weekend!!üëçüëç'

author: Jennyfer Paniagua
text: 'Unbelievable prices on the wine selection most defiantly the cheapest there is in hoboken!!! The staff was accommodating to my various questions.'

author: Anirudh Das
text: 'Poor suggestions and dreadful stuff. Absolute waste of money.'

author: Ben Dobson
text: 'Excellent selection of wine and friendly staff . Delite held on to and returned my wallet when I left it there accidentally.. Thanks Delite!'

author: Aida Betancourt
text: 'Good price & selection'

author: Michael Desousa
text: 'This place is cheaper than a lot of other liquor stores in the area. Very friendly group of guys!'

author: vijay adial
text: 'Best liquor store in town.  Cheaper prices in all varieties of wine.  Great selection of sake.'

author: GLOBEATER Montreal
text: 'Huuuuuuge selection of all things alcoholic.'

author: Bryan Gardner
text: 'Good selections of beer. A little bit pricey'

author: C Barr
text: 'Nice selection. Cheaper prices than places off Washington. Friendly staff.'
